title: Cloud Empress Compendium
description:
for use with Mothership system implementation by hollowphoton & crew. Heavily recommend using a module for new sheets (ex. Free Form Sheets). The stats/saves that've been renamed for macro purposes are as follows:
Mind=Intellect
Heart=Strength
Strength=Combat
Reality=Sanity
All tables used are from the free Cloud Empress rulebook by worlds by watt.
